report_type: Type of report: health, environmental, weather, emergency
timestamp: Timestamp when the report was submitted
severity: Severity level: low, moderate, high, critical
specific_type: Specific issue type based on report category
timeframe: When incident occurred: now, 1hour, today, yesterday, week, ongoing
contact_phone: Phone number of person submitting report (optional)
is_anonymous: Whether the report was submitted anonymously
media_urls: Array of URLs to uploaded images/videos (up to 10)
status: Report status: pending, reviewed, resolved, closed
reviewed_by: ID of official who reviewed the report
latitude: Latitude coordinate of the incident location
longitude: Longitude coordinate of the incident location
